newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico to audit 500,000 individuals and cos in '97.
newsitem.headline: Mexico to audit 500,000 individuals and cos in '97.

text.p: Mexico's Finance Ministry will audit 500,000 individuals and companies in 1997, 25 percent more than in 1996, a newspaper reported on Tuesday.
Miguel Gomez Bravo, a top legal official with the ministry, said 1,500 auditors have been hired nationwide to achieve the task, the newspaper Siglo 21 reported in the western city of Guadalajara.
Gomez said the ministry was looking at ways for people doing business in the underground economy to right their tax situation with a minimum of difficulty, Siglo 21 reported.
